headline: ComEd Reinforces Commitment to Fight Rising Energy Costs as Part of "The Exelon Promise"
summary: CHICAGO, February 23, 2026--As families and small businesses across northern Illinois continue to face higher energy bills, ComEd today reinforced its commitment as parent company, Exelon, launches The Exelon Promise—a comprehensive, customer-first strategy focused on delivering immediate customer relief, strong protections amid growing demand, and long-term solutions to address the root causes driving higher costs.

content.title: ComEd Reinforces Commitment to Fight Rising Energy Costs as Part of "The Exelon Promise"
